## *TNBC: APE Visualization*
```{r}
#read the Newick file

#read in data frame
tnbc.cnv <- vroom(here("data","tnbc.cnv.csv"))
```

```{r}

#filter
sa501 <- tnbc.cnv %>% filter(Sample_Name == "SA501")

write.csv(x = sa501,
          file = here("data", "SA501.tbnc.cnv.csv"),
          quote = FALSE,
          row.names = TRUE)

```
